casebody.data:
STOUFFER v. WARDEN OF MARYLAND HOUSE OF CORRECTION [H. C. No. 11,

September Term, 1958.]

Decided November 13, 1958.

Before Bruñe, C. J., and Henderson, Hammond, Prescott and Horney, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Application for leave to appeal from the denial of a writ of habeas corpus is denied for the reasons set out in the opinion of the lower court.
